description: Structured information on an electrode array.
label: Electrode array
name: ElectrodeArray

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect._instruction: Add two or more electrodes which build this array.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect.description: Elements in a semiconductor device that emits or collects electrons or holes or controls their movements.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect.label: Electrodes
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/elect.name: electrodes

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this electrode array within the file it is stored in.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/inter.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this electrode array that may help you to more easily find it again.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel
